meanings.definition: A plural form of the word 'be'.
meanings.sent1: The students were happy to learn about the different forms of bes.
meanings.sent2: The bes of the flowers in the garden are colorful.
meanings.sent3: The bes of the crayons in the box made the artist smile.
meanings.sent4: The bes of the stars in the night sky seemed infinite.
meanings.sent5: The bes of the family members at the reunion was heartwarming.

meanings.definition: A verb meaning to exist or live.
meanings.sent1: The bes of the animals in the forest is fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: His bes in the city was filled with excitement and new experiences.
meanings.sent3: The bes of the old tree in the backyard seemed to tell stories.
meanings.sent4: The bes of the music in the concert hall enveloped the audience.
meanings.sent5: The bes of the characters in the book made the story come alive.

meanings.definition: A noun meaning a type of shrub.
meanings.sent1: The bes in the garden added a touch of greenery to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beauty of the bes with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bes near the fence seemed to whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The bes in the park stood tall and proud like guardians.
meanings.sent5: The bes along the path created a natural barrier.
